title: Windows 11 Pro for under $10? Yes, it’s a deal so good you might not believe it
description: Macworld Even the most dedicated Mac users sometimes need to dip into Windows, whether it’s for cross-platform development, gaming, running a virtual machine, or just staying flexible for work. For those moments, having a reliable Windows license on hand is key. Right now through July 20, StackSocial is offering a lifetime license to Microsoft Windows 11 Pro for just $9.97—a massive drop from the usual $199 price tag. This deal includes the full Pro version, not a stripped-down edition, with features like enhanced encryption, remote desktop access, BitLocker, and improved virtualization support. Windows 11 Pro is built for productivity and performance, with a streamlined interface, better window snapping, and deep support for hybrid workflows. It’s especially handy for users running Parallels, VMware, or dual-boot setups through Boot Camp. Another bonus? There’s Copilot, the AI-powered assistant that can answer queries, generate content, and even help you prepare for certification exams. This is a one-time purchase, meaning there are no subscriptions or recurring fees. Just a license key and lifetime access. Setup is simple, and once it’s installed, the license is locked to your machine permanently. Whether for work, testing, or just keeping all software bases covered, this is one of the easiest and most affordable ways to add Windows to your macOS ecosystem. Don’t wait to grab your Windows 11 Pro lifetime license for just $9.97 until July 20 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Supplies are limited and no coupon is needed. Microsoft Windows 11 ProSee Deal StackSocial prices subject to change.
excerpt: Built for hybrid users and power setups, this OS deal unlocks remote desktop, BitLocker, and Copilot AI tools—and there are no monthly fees attached.

html:
Image: StackCommerce

Even the most dedicated Mac users sometimes need to dip into Windows, whether it’s for cross-platform development, gaming, running a virtual machine, or just staying flexible for work. For those moments, having a reliable Windows license on hand is key.

Right now through July 20, StackSocial is offering a lifetime license to Microsoft Windows 11 Pro for just $9.97—a massive drop from the usual $199 price tag. This deal includes the full Pro version, not a stripped-down edition, with features like enhanced encryption, remote desktop access, BitLocker, and improved virtualization support.

Windows 11 Pro is built for productivity and performance, with a streamlined interface, better window snapping, and deep support for hybrid workflows. It’s especially handy for users running Parallels, VMware, or dual-boot setups through Boot Camp. Another bonus? There’s Copilot, the AI-powered assistant that can answer queries, generate content, and even help you prepare for certification exams.

This is a one-time purchase, meaning there are no subscriptions or recurring fees. Just a license key and lifetime access. Setup is simple, and once it’s installed, the license is locked to your machine permanently.

Whether for work, testing, or just keeping all software bases covered, this is one of the easiest and most affordable ways to add Windows to your macOS ecosystem.

Don’t wait to grab your Windows 11 Pro lifetime license for just $9.97 until July 20 at 11:59 p.m. PT. Supplies are limited and no coupon is needed.

Microsoft Windows 11 ProSee Deal

StackSocial prices subject to change.
